name: Podcasting
description: This course offers the skills and techniques needed to script, record and publish podcasts to the Web. Students will design and carry out original primary research to script, edit and produce independent podcasts. The course also explores the growing popularity of podcasts, and modern societies? shift into a secondary orality. The course draws on a range of researchers and theorists; including Aristotle, Walter, Wells, Lindstrom, McLuhan, Kawasaki. [24L]
